ai-mil7.8.7:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the four factors of a dragon?”
ai-mil7.8.7:1.2_0: “Now, great king, if you loose this earth with a strong rope, tie that shots on the ground, attacks to earth, carts, and cracking the knees, throats, and crushing the neck, ‘I’ll rub the tips,’ ‘I’m put down from the top of the nose.’
ai-mil7.8.7:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, one who, having slaughtered energy, leaves the roads to winnowing goods, energy, and vigor. He should establish mindfulness in the six doors. ...
ai-mil7.8.7:1.4_0: This is the first thing, great king, for the sake of all the factors.
ai-mil7.8.7:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, a feverous jealousy, smeared with dirt, straightensive counselors, and accessible for the huts.
ai-mil7.8.7:2.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who haunts the meditator’s body should sit down in this body made up of the heartwood.
ai-mil7.8.7:2.3_0: This is the second thing, great king, for the second time.
ai-mil7.8.7:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the hermits draws close to the trainees.
ai-mil7.8.7:3.2_0: In the same way, great king, you should plunge into this body.
ai-mil7.8.7:3.3_0: The meditator who in this body should (before) apply himself to the body in this body.
ai-mil7.8.7:3.4_0: He should be told what is impermanent ... as suffering ...
ai-mil7.8.7:3.34_0: who is liable to grow old ...
ai-mil7.8.7:3.41_0: Now, great king, you should plunge into this body.
ai-mil7.8.7:4.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the hermit enjoys what was given.
ai-mil7.8.7:4.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should clearly prepare the object of his conclusion.
ai-mil7.8.7:4.3_0: This is the fourth victor’s position.
ai-mil7.8.7:4.4_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.8.7:5.2_0: She got ready to harm him.
ai-mil7.8.7:6.2_0: who desires the welfare of the people.
ai-mil7.8.7:6.3_0: if you to live at the Ariṭṭha.
ai-mil7.8.7:7.1_0: The seventh enquiry is the seventh (called) Discipline,
ai-mil7.8.7:8.1_0: The seventh sub-chapter on continuation is finished.
ai-mil7.8.7:11.1_0: The discussion on Questions is finished.
